Monitor.​ViewApp.​ViewModel.​MainWindowViewModel
ViewModelBase
public
Monitor.​ViewApp.​ViewModel.​MainWindowViewModel

MainWindowViewModel class stores the logic & data of the MainWindowView.  The main goal of the MainWindowViewModel is to link between the user's selected view to the UI components.  The class handles the main framework of the application.  This class inherits from Galasoft.MvvmLight.ViewModelBase which is the base class for any ViewModel in MVVM pattern.
